General.Name: Zhejiang Zanyu Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zanyu Technology Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of surfactants and oleo chemicals in China and internationally. The company offers anionic surfactant, including sodium and ammonium lauryl ether sulfate, linear alkyl benzene sulfonic acid, sodium alpha-olefin sulfonate, and sodium and ammonium lauryl sulfate; nonionic surfactant, such as coconut monoethanolamide, fatty acid diethanolamide, and alkyl polyglucosides; and amphoteric surfactant comprising cocamidopropy betaine and cocamidopropyl amine oxide. It also provides oleochemicals, which include hydrogenated oil, fatty acid, fatty acid ester, glycerin, stearate, dimer acid/polyamide resin, and monoacids; and cleaning products OEM/ODM consisting of antibacterial laundry liquid and powder, degreasing and cleaning detergent, antibacterial laundry soap, hand care sanitizer, and oily washing liquid, as well as degreasing essence, fruit, and vegetable lotion. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Zanyu Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zanyu Technology Group Co., Ltd. in November 2016. Zanyu Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

4.Name: Ms. Guo Xiao  Ren
